localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: A powerful website builder built on an open source CMS, offering in-context live editing and dynamic visual design tools with multisite enablement. An extensible and modular system in a full stack JS environment ready for traditional or headless deployment.
nodes.title: Apostrophe 3.0 - A powerful website builder built on an open source CMS
nodes.author: Alex Gilbert

nodes.excerpt: With Deploy Now from IONOS, you can git push your static website or web project from GitHub directly without any build or bandwidth restrictions. Staging, SSL and georedundant, DDoS-protected infrastructure are included in the free plan.
nodes.title: Deploy Now - Git push your web project and go live instantly
nodes.author: Robert Schleinhege

nodes.excerpt: Current Virtual DOM implementations are inadequateâ€”Ranging from overcomplicated to abandoned, most are unusable without sacrificing raw performance and size. Million aims to fix this, providing a library-agnostic Virtual DOM to serve as the core for Javascript libraries.
nodes.title: Million.js - A fast, <1kb virtual DOM
nodes.author: Aiden Bai

nodes.excerpt: Lighthouse 8.0 is here! âš¡ Improved CWV balance for the Performance Score, Lighthouse Treemap and metric filtering now in PSI and Canary DevTools, and a brand new CSP audit!
nodes.title: Lighthouse 8.0 - Analyze web apps & sites, collect modern performance metrics
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Chat over SSH, straight from the Terminal. Free and open source: github.com/quackduck/devzat. Give it a star!
nodes.title: Devzat - Chat with other devs over SSH in your Terminal
nodes.author: Ishan Goel

nodes.excerpt: react-nice-avatar can easily generate an avatar for your users with no efforts
nodes.title: Nice avatar - React component for generating avatars
nodes.author: wwayne

nodes.excerpt: Gradient king provides a huge collection of elegant gradients. We also provide a well-efficient gradient generator where you could drag and drop your image and grab the gradients from it, Dark mode, categories, search, like, download, bookmark, and much more.
nodes.title: Gradient King - Curated collection of 125+ fresh gradients
nodes.author: Savio Martin

nodes.excerpt: https://github.com/krikienoid/flagwaver â€¢ Upload images from the web or from your device. â€¢ Supports flag cloths with different aspect ratios. â€¢ Set the hoist side and flag orientation. â€¢ Try out different flagpoles. â€¢ Adjust wind speed and direction. â€¢ Progressive Web App support.
nodes.title: FlagWaver - A web app for simulating a waving flag.
nodes.author: Espen Kulia

nodes.excerpt: Tag your time, get the insight.
nodes.title: TimeTagger - Open source time tracker

nodes.excerpt: Quod AI's Chrome extension helps software developers resolve issues smarter. See instant search suggestions for code and more from your Github or Jira issues. Powered by AI.
nodes.title: Quod AI for Github & Jira issues - 1-click search for code & context from Github/Jira issues
nodes.author: Ravi Sethia

nodes.excerpt: A Python package to copy all your Kindle highlights and notes to a database in Notion. Plug in your Kindle device to your PC to run this script. Requires Python 3.9+ installed on your system.
nodes.title: Kindle2Notion - Export your Kindle clippings to a Notion database
nodes.author: Jeffrey Jacob

nodes.excerpt: Axolo is the best way to collaborate on Github pull requests ğŸ‘€ Create a temporary Slack channel for each pull request where only reviewers and creators are invited ğŸ’» Start code reviews faster, avoid useless back and forth ğŸ˜Œ Promote feedback upon code review
nodes.title: Axolo - Reduce pull request time & ship code faster

nodes.excerpt: Hi, This is a Open Source Template to build GPT-3 Apps Features - NextJS/React - Host on Vercel/Nerlify - Example API endpoint that calls GPT-3 API without exposing API key on the client side - Open Source, Free to use in commercial Apps. thanks, Harish
nodes.title: Serverless NextJS/GPT-3 Template - A serverless NextJS/React template to build GPT-3 apps
nodes.author: Harish Garg

nodes.excerpt: A free Internet is a better Internet. The Free Internet Plugin removes known paywalled sites from your Google search results. It is open-sourced on HackerNoon's GitHub. F*ck paywalls.
nodes.title: The Free Internet Plugin - Removes paywalled stories from Google results
nodes.author: David Smooke

nodes.excerpt: Lofi Club is a place for listening to live 24/7 Lofi music. Comes with more than 17+ tracks, Live Chat, Distraction-free music player, to-do list, Pomodoro timer, keyboard control, playlist, fullscreen mode makes the app super productive for daily use!
nodes.title: Lofi Club - Enjoy hip hop beats to relax or study
nodes.author: Savio Martin

nodes.excerpt: Cryptgeon is a fast, secure, open source self-destructing note sharing service. Inspired by PrivNote, Powered by rust & svelte.
nodes.title: Cryptgeon - Securely share self-destructing notes
nodes.author: Bharadwaj Giridhar

nodes.excerpt: Anon is an automated machine learning cloud service. It delivers a data scientist as a service, at a fraction of the costs, without needing to have machine learning knowledge.
nodes.title: anon - Machine learning, automated
nodes.author: Mihai Anton

nodes.excerpt: Yes, I am providing the service of making your product on product hunt #1 product of the day. Isn't it illegal or prohibited to do this? I am not harming or damaging product hunt because it is allowed to use marketing for your product hunt listing.
nodes.title: Get #1 On Product Hunt - Become #1 Product Of The Day On Product Hunt
nodes.author: whyucan

nodes.excerpt: Slidev is a web-based slides maker and presenter powered by Vite. It's designed for developers to focus on writing content in Markdown while also having the power of HTML and Vue components to deliver pixel-perfect layouts and designs with embedded interactive demos in your presentations.
nodes.title: Slidev - Presentation slides for developers
nodes.author: Anthony Fu

nodes.excerpt: Refined Zapier is a free open source browser extension to improve the user experience of Zapier. We've enhanced styling, search, and navigation to help power users move faster and stay organized.
nodes.title: Refined Zapier - Open-source browser extension to improve Zapier's UX
nodes.author: Zach Waterfield

nodes.excerpt: Notea is a Self hosted Note taking app stored on S3, that you can deploy with one click to Vercel, AWS, or deploy with Docker ğŸ³. It supports storage in Amazon S3, MinIO, Aliyun OSS and others. It's powered by TypeScript ğŸš€ and loves Mark Down.
nodes.title: Notea - Free self-hosted open source note taking app, like Notion
nodes.author: Bharadwaj Giridhar

nodes.excerpt: Monitor your development flow in one place from all your usual tools. Sorted & prioritized clean data aggregated in actionable automated boards. Easily track issues, PRs & actions required across your team and collaborate effectively on hot development tasks.
nodes.title: Keypup 2.0 - Development streamlining & get pull requests under control
nodes.author: Stephane Ibos

nodes.excerpt: With these design patterns by Juro and Stefania Passera, you can turn boring legal text into a transparent, engaging document that people can actually read.
nodes.title: Privacy Policy Template by Juro - Get a privacy policy people can actually read
nodes.author: Christoph Janz

nodes.excerpt: Never forget a section for your readme again! Select sections to add to your readme, edit the contents, and drag to rearrange. See a live-updating rendered preview of your markdown, then download your README.md file!
nodes.title: readme.so - Easily create the perfect readme for your project
nodes.author: Katherine Peterson

nodes.excerpt: Lip Gloss a Go library for designing terminal user interfaces. It takes an expressive, declarative approach to terminal rendering. Users familiar with CSS will feel right at home with Lip Gloss.
nodes.title: Lip Gloss - Design terminal user interfaces
nodes.author: Christian Rocha
